<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Telluric Power](/Feats.aspx?ID=4402) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 45 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You channel strength from the earth beneath your feet to pummel your enemies. When making a melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=89) against a target who is standing on the same earth or stone surface as you are, you gain a circumstance bonus to the damage roll equal to the number of weapon damage dice.
name: Telluric Power
